@00 1101000000000101 // MOV R0, 5
@01 1101000100000010 // MOV R1, 2
@02 1010000101000000 // ADD R2, R1, R0 -> 7
@03 0110001001100000 // LDR R3, R2 -> [R3] = M[R2] = M[7] = 1000010110100000
@04 0110000000100000 // LDR R1, R0 -> [R1] = M[R0] = M[5] = 1100000010001010
@05 1100000010001010 // MOV R4, R2 {shift 01} -> R4 = 7*2 
@06 1011000110100010 // AND R5, R1, R2 -> 010 & 111 -> 010
@07 1000010110100000 // STR R6, R5  M[R6] = R5
@08 1110000000000000 // HALT
@09 1010101111001101
